name: Neon Database
description: Create serverless Postgres databases on Neon. Returns a DATABASE_URL connection string ready to use.
author: Prompt Stack

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: Region for the database (aws-us-east-1, aws-us-west-2, aws-eu-central-1). Default: aws-us-east-1

inputs.name: write_env
inputs.description: Path to .env file to write DATABASE_URL (optional)

secrets.label: Neon API Key
secrets.description: API key for creating serverless Postgres databases
